attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have been an avid reader, or maybe listener. 
It is a wonderful thing to understand that the thoughts of the Prime Minister are at our ease of access.

Yet where is the Respond, Comment, or Request...?? All of this entire site is guided towards listening, but far too much of it appears to be unidirectional.
Perhaps it would be a good idea to represent, and listen to the Electorate, rather than preaching to it.

I can Petition all I like, but it would be desirable to be Heard.

Or are you going to just sit there, smile and nod...??

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
